titles.title: National Churchill Museum Act of 2007
To authorize reference to the Winston Churchill Memorial and Library in Fulton, Missouri, as the "National Churchill Museum".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

bill.summary:
2/28/2007--Introduced.
National Churchill Museum Act of 2007 - Authorizes the Winston Churchill Memorial and Library located in Fulton, Missouri, and owned and managed by Westminster College to refer to itself as the "National Churchill Museum."
